metadata.title: CVE-2023-52425 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows a denial of service (resource consumption)because many full reparsings are required in the case of a large token forwhich multiple buffer fills are needed.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
